name: Letterboxd's Top 1000 Movies with Over 50k Watched
description:
Interested to see how this progresses, as technically the list should get better and better as time goes on!
I'll slap a few new ones on every weekend as they cross the threshold, but if you notice something that should be here but isn't lmk!
..........................................................................................
Small conditions added in that I'm leaving off Concert films, Behind the Scenes docs, and TV show connected movies.
Most Popular Directors:
Scorsese 14
Coens 13
Hitchcock 13
Spielberg 13
Miyazaki 11
..........................................................................................
1/4: Babylon, Barbie amd the Diamond Castle, Doctor Zhivago, Mad God, Puss in Boots: The Last Wish, Rome Open City, The Rules of the Game, 13 Assassins, Vampyr
